title: Troll Vocalizations
description: Troll Vocalizations sound package with 172 high-quality big-monster sound effects, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/troll-vocalizations-preview

Full Audio Preview: https://youtu.be/mCzHGHdiEb0

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/x83mini4l4lhdhr/MSE%20-%20Troll%20Vocalizations.pdf?dl=0


The Troll is a huge, clumsy, slow-moving monster, but extremely strong. All of its qualities formed the basis for the creation of this creature's vocalizations.


The collection contains 18 voice actions, including 172 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 16 voice sounds during an attack
  • 8 battle shouts
  • 16 deaths
  • 20 growls
  • 16 pains
  • 20 roars
  • 8 snarls
  • 8 victory shouts
  • 8 bellowing sounds
  • 4 breathing sounds
  • 4 coughing sounds
  • 8 effort sounds
  • 8 groans
  • 8 idle voice sounds
  • 8 sounds when jumping
  • 4 laughing sounds
  • 4 sounds of upset
  • 8 grunting sounds


Among the attacking type of vocalizations there are both short and long ones, the pain type vocalizations also have different lengths. The voice samples are quite dry and ready for further processing. Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs.Â 


This package is perfect for creating the voices of monsters: troll, ogre, beast, critter, big troglodyte, giant, titan, mutant, orc, dinosaur and other creatures.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, horror or any other where monsters live and roar. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 172 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 18 voice actions
  • 80 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 40 voice samples of the pain type
  • 52 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 172

Number of Audio Cues: 172

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 4 minutes 09 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
